name: Empire Expansion
description:
You start with a castle and your empire will gradually grow. You must build farms to feed your people and build towers to protect them from raiders.

CONTROLS

  • Click tile :  left mouse
  • Menu  :  escape
  • zoom : mouse wheel

Hot keys

  • build farm : 1
  • Build tower : 2
  • Demolish village : 3

This game was made for the Kenney Jam 2022. The theme was 'Growth'.
